about.details:
Incorporated in 2020, Cellecor Gadgets Limited is engaged in the procurement, branding, and distribution of televisions, mobile phones, Smart Wearables, mobile accessories, smart watches, and neckbands.

The company has three business verticals:

  1. Entertainment and Communication: Here, the company provides smart and conventional televisions that are fully outfitted with the GENZ Android operating system, and sound systems & sound bars. This category has 35 SKUs of televisions, 15 SKUs of sound systems and sound bars, and 70 SKUs of mobile phones.
  2. Peripherals: Here, the company provides True Wireless ("TWS") Earbuds, Neckbands, and Smart Watches. These categories have more than 145 SKUs.
  3. Modern Accessories: Here, the company provides power banks, data cables, USB chargers, quick chargers, and other items under this category, many Wireless and Standard Power banks, all types of high-strength data lines, and the necessary adapters or chargers for each. More than 40 SKUs fall into this category.

Cellecor Gadgets has more than 1200 service centers, and more than 800 Distributors. Its products are also present at over 24,000 retail stores with more than 300 ranges of products and 100 million users in Pan India through offline and online channels.

The company recorded Rs. 26,436.56 Lacs, and Rs. 12,128.99 Lacs in Revenue from operations in fiscal 2023 and 2022.

faqs.question: What is the Cellecor Gadgets IPO?
faqs.answer:
Cellecor Gadgets IPO is a SME IPO of 5518800 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹50.77 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹92 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on September 15, 2023, and closes on September 20, 2023.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Cellecor Gadgets IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Cellecor Gadgets IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Cellecor Gadgets IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Cellecor Gadgets IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Cellecor Gadgets IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Cellecor Gadgets IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Cellecor Gadgets IPO opens on September 15, 2023 and closes on September 20, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Cellecor Gadgets IPO?
faqs.answer: Cellecor Gadgets IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Cellecor Gadgets IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Cellecor Gadgets IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Cellecor Gadgets IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Cellecor Gadgets IPO will be done on Monday, September 25, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, September 27, 2023. Check the Cellecor Gadgets IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Cellecor Gadgets IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Cellecor Gadgets IPO listing date is on Thursday, September 28, 2023.
